This biographical drama tells the story of Johnny Cash's life, including his romance with June Carter (played by Reese Witherspoon), which adds a sweet and tender element to the movie. The film also stars Joaquin Phoenix as Johnny Cash, and it's an excellent portrayal of the country music legend.
